Uses of Package
be.hehehe.geekbot.annotations

    Package Description
    be.hehehe.geekbot.annotations  
    be.hehehe.geekbot.bot

  • Classes in be.hehehe.geekbot.annotations used by be.hehehe.geekbot.annotations 
    Class and Description
    TriggerType
    Trigger types.
  • Classes in be.hehehe.geekbot.annotations used by be.hehehe.geekbot.bot 
    Class and Description
    Triggers 
  • Classes in be.hehehe.geekbot.annotations used by be.hehehe.geekbot.commands 
    Class and Description
    BotCommand
    Annotate any class to indicate that it contains trigger commands.
    Help
    Annotate a method (already annotated with @Trigger) to specify its help string.
    RandomAction
    Will execute this method randomly when someone speaks on the chan.
    TimedAction
    Execute a command repeatedly.
    Trigger
    Annotate a method (from a class annotated with @BotCommand) to indicate it is a trigger.
